Package com.marcosavard.commons.time

Class HolidayCalendar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.marcosavard.commons.time.HolidayCalendar
  • public class HolidayCalendar
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that gives a calendar of holidays (and other events).
    Author:
    Marco

      • findNDayOfWeekInMonth

        public static java.util.Date findNDayOfWeekInMonth​(int year,
                                                   int month,
                                                   int dayOfWeek,
                                                   int rank)
        Date date = findNDayOfWeekInMonth(2018, 5, Calendar.SUNDAY, 2) return the 2nd Sunday of May (5th month) 2018
        Parameters:
        year - a given year (e.g. 2018)
        month - a given month in the range [1..12]
        dayOfWeek - from 1 (Calendar.SUNDAY) to 7 (Calendar.SATURDAY)
        rank - first, second, thirf or fourth of the month
        Returns:
        date of the holiday
